properties.additional information: At least 40 drug trafficking messages on banners against the Mexican Navy appeared in different cities in Veracruz.
properties.event summary: 09/26/2011: On Monday, in Veracruz, Mexico, at least 40 drug trafficking messages on banners against the Mexican Navy appeared in Xalapa, Cardel, Cordoba, Orizaba, Coatzacoalcos, and Minatitlan. A group that called itself Sociedad Desesperada (Desperate Society) signed the messages. The messages asked the Senate Chamber to stop Navy operations in the area.  The messages read: Gentlemen of the Senate, given that no one pays attention to us, we ask help from the senate, we no longer endure the Navy, which is the armed wing of  Chapo Guzman, headed by Felipe Calderon. There are many missing and those found by the sailors have been found dead; it is the same group from Monclova, Coahuila, it is the same group operating in Veracruz that is making our family members disappear and there is evidence that they are responsible.
properties.event title: Drug Trafficking Messages on Banner in Veracruz, Mexico
properties.communication placement: The banners were placed in different cities in Veracruz.
properties.location: The drug trafficking messages on banners were located in Xalapa, Veracruz, Mexico.

properties.event summary: 09/29/2011: On Thursday, on kilometer 44 of Poza Rica-Casonez highway, in Tuxpan, Veracruz, Mexico, Marine personnel arrested three individuals who were identified as members of Los Zetas. Marine personnel also seized two documents with extortion messages and one drug trafficking banner with messages against the Marines. The individuals were linked to the drug trafficking banner found in Veracruz. The article does not state how the individuals were arrested. The individuals were arrested for their involvement with the drug trafficking banner in Veracruz. No group claimed responsibility for this incident. No casualties were reported for this incident.
properties.event title: Marine Personnel Arrested Three Members of Los Zetas in Tuxpan, Veracruz, Mexico
properties.location: The individuals were arrested on kilometer 44 of Poza Rica-Casonez highway in Tuxpan, Veracruz, Mexico.
